title: World Fighting Bull
text:
World Fighting Bull were a <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team that played in the county's <a href="Top%20League">Top League</a> competition. The team was the rugby team of clothing company <a href="World%20Co.%2C%20Ltd.">World Co.</a>, based in <a href="Kobe">Kobe</a> in the <a href="Kansai">Kansai</a> area of Japan.
The team was founded in 1984, and spent their formative seasons playing in the . They were one of the founding members of the Top League, playing in the inaugural season in <a href="2003%E2%80%9304%20Top%20League">2003–04</a>. The team played in the first four editions of the competition, before being relegated at the end of the <a href="2006%E2%80%9307%20Top%20League">2006–07</a>. After two more seasons playing in the , World Fighting Bull were dissolved in March 2009 after financial difficulties at World Co.
